title: Avery's Desire
description: Avery has dreamed of becoming a rock star like his idol, and biggest crush, Brian Mueller. As Avery's band gains popularity, a chance encounter puts him in Brain's sights. With a love rival lurking behinds the scenes, a budding new romance, and a battle of the bands hanging on the line, will Avery find his true desire, or will everything he loves come crashing down around him?
author: Chance McGinnis
